org.jhotdraw.app.action.app
Class OpenApplicationAction

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.AbstractAction
      org.jhotdraw.app.action.AbstractApplicationAction
          org.jhotdraw.app.action.app.OpenApplicationAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.Action, Disposable
public class OpenApplicationAction
extends AbstractApplicationAction

Handles an open application request from Mac OS X (this action does nothing).

This action is called when DefaultOSXApplication receives an Open Application event from the Mac OS X Finder or another Mac OS X application.

This action is automatically created by DefaultOSXApplication and put into the ApplicationModel before ApplicationModel.initApplication(org.jhotdraw.app.Application) is called.

Version:
$Id: OpenApplicationAction.java 666 2010-07-28 19:11:46Z rawcoder $

Werner Randelshofer
